group_1.textLeft: ...It looks like we've been separated from@everyone else, thanks to the fire shutters.
...Are you okay, Harumi?

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah...@I was really surprised, but I'm fine.

group_1.textLeft: It's just the two of us here... Which means@Masara and Sougetsu are up ahead...
Everyone else must be behind us...@So, if we include Ash's group, then I guess...
We must've been divided up into four groups@with fire shutters between us all.

group_1.textRight: This emergency door in the shutters is supposed@to be for times like this, but it seems to be busted...

group_1.textLeft: This place is apparently an abandoned school,@so maybe it's just old...
I don't see any signs of a fire yet, so I'm@hoping this is just part of the show...
Oh, but anyway, I'm sure we can meet up with@everyone once we make our way outside!
Knowing Masara, she'd definitely prioritize@escaping first, considering the danger.
I'm sure that Kanagi's brother...that is,@Sougetsu, will definitely be with her.
So let's focus on evacuating for now!@...If that sounds good to you?

group_1.textRight: Yes... That's, good...

group_1.textLeft: Um... You're still pretty anxious, I see...

group_1.textRight: Oh, um... I'm sorry, I know you@were trying to cheer me up...
Actually, I've been having a bit of@a hard time with Sougetsu lately...
I know this isn't the time for it...

group_1.textLeft: I don't know if I can help,@but I can at least hear you out!
I bet us two being put together like@this is some kind of twist of fate.
So let's make the most out of it@and have a bit of girl talk!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* Thanks, Kokoro. You're very sweet.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see. Things got awkward@during the games, huh...
(Ugh... I was so focused on myself@that I didn't notice at all...)

group_1.textRight: Neither the quizzes nor the@competitions went well...
...I guess it's only natural since the@rest of us here are all girls, but...
Sougetsu seemed unenthusiastic@about it from the very beginning.
And, well, he doesn't usually@like to speak his mind either...
So I feel kind of guilty, like I'm the only one@who wants to win and I'm dragging him along...
And another thing! He called me by my@first name when he confessed to me,
but lately, he's gone right back to my@last name again! It's like...you know...
...I just have no idea what's on his mind anymore!

group_1.textLeft: I totally get it! I understand that feeling, I really do!
Ah... Maybe it's a little forward to say@that I understand it so easily, but...
I really don't get what@Masara is thinking either.
It's been like that the whole time I've known her!

group_1.textRight: Really...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. She doesn't care about herself enough, and@the way she thinks is completely different from me.
Because of that, we get into fights...or, I guess@I always just get upset on my own, like earlier.
Our relationship seems one-sided like that.
I still don't understand Masara at all.
In the first quiz, if I'd been the one@answering, I'm sure we wouldn't have won.
Besides which, Masara didn't@seem to be that into it either...
...There's no meaning in playing bond-testing@games in the first place.

group_1.textRight: Okay, we'll turn it around from here.@Let's do our best, Masara!

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:350400:eyeClose_1][chara:350400:lipSynch_1]Right.
When you get down to it, our personalities@have never been similar to begin with.
And our wavelengths have never@quite matched either, have they?

group_1.textRight: ...Why are you two so close, then?
...Isn't it hard to be with someone@you don't get along with?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes, you're right.@It's like we just don't match up...
...But, it's exactly because there are@things I don't understand,
that I want to get to know Masara better,@to really understand her.
That's why...

group_1.textRight: But...even so, I wanted to be close to you!
So I've been trying to meet you halfway,@but now you go and say something like that...

group_1.textLeft: Thinking back, I shouldn't have@gotten mad at her earlier...
It's not fair to her, not when I'm the one who's@trying to get to know her in the first place...
...So you see, this is why we get into fights like this.
Because we still don't understand@each other well enough...
...But, as Masara was saying,@in the end we're different people.
We'll probably never learn everything@about one another no matter what we do.
But I think that's exactly what@human communication is all about:
To strive to get to know each other as best we can.

group_1.textRight: I see...
Now that you mention it, all I've done so far@is complain that I can't understand Sougetsu,
when the truth is, I don't think I've@ever made an effort to change that.
I'm supposed to be older than you, Kokoro,@but I definitely haven't been acting the part...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, no, I'm not that great...@I got most of this from Masara, actually.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* But now that you've heard me out,@I feel a little better.
Okay, I'm going to get out of here so that I@can have a proper talk with Sougetsu!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's do our best together!
